# ssd_nvme
Cmdline "Data Units Written" tracker for SSD with NVM Express

open "cmd.exe" with admin.
do this:
<pre>
cd c:\Program Files\
git clone https://github.com/adler3d/ssd_nvme.git
cd ssd_nvme
set_env.bat
build.bat
</pre>

also: 
open "mmc.exe" and then import ssd_nvme_tracker.xml

<b>output_file:</b> 
`C:\Program Files\ssd_nvme\nvme_main.log`

<b>output_file example:</b>  
<pre>
10.08.2018 
00:37
nvme_main.cpp
HostReads_delta = 203
HostWrites_delta = 102
HostReads_delta_GB = 0.096798
HostWrites_delta_GB = 0.048637
HostReads_GB = 611.866474
HostWrites_GB = 589.158535
rub_wasted = 38.868098
RAW: 
</pre>
